element.name: Custom Data Element Usage
element.definition: The Usage (Mandatory, Required, Recommended or Optional) for the Custom Data Element.
element.v3Comment:
Mandatory = Must be completed and will not accept null values
Required = Must be completed but will accept null values
Recommended = Not required but if collected will accept null values
Optional = Not required but if collected, it cannot be a null value.
element.v3Changes: Added to allow customized data elements to be inserted and collected from within the NEMSIS Version 3 standard.
